briefDescription: Aggregate type representing a collection of threads on a gpu.
detailedDescription: Aggregate type representing a collection of threads on a gpu, where a "thread" is a gpu queue.

items.name: type
items.briefDescription: The type of work that the family's threads can perform.
items.detailedDescription: The type of work that the family's threads can perform.

items.name: threads
items.detailedDescription: The family's threads, where a "thread" is a gpu queue.

items.name: program_manager_count
items.briefDescription: The amount of [[gpu_program_manager]] currently on the family's threads.
items.detailedDescription: The amount of [[gpu_program_manager]] currently on the family's threads.
